amendment.description: To make the child tax credit acceleration applicable to 2002.

action.text: Amendment SA 611 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 611 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 166.
Amendment SA 611 proposed by Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR 5/14/2003 S6246-6247; text: CR 5/14/2003 S6246) To make the child tax credit acceleration applicable to 2002.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 611 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 166.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 611 proposed by Senator Conrad.
